name: InterruptedAorticArchDisordersSNOMED
title: Interrupted Aortic Arch (Disorders) (SNOMED)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnoses or problems that represent that the patient has Interrupted Aortic Arch regardless of the clinical presentation of the condition),(Data Element Scope: Diagnoses or problems documented in a clinical record.),(Inclusion Criteria: IAA types A, B or C, or all IAA if type unknown or not otherwise specified (NOS)),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
